TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPageTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

summary.span: 提供用來導向 訊息至 ASP.NET 網頁輸出的接聽程式。

span.span: Provides a listener that directs messages to ASP.NET Web page outputs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 屬性套用至這個類別具有下列屬性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不會影響桌面應用程式 (這些應用程式的啟動方式一般都是按兩下圖示、輸入命令或在瀏覽器輸入 URL)。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 類別或[SQL Server 程式設計和主機保護屬性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). 類別會將寫入追蹤訊息轉送至 ASP.NET Web 網頁輸出通道的記錄檔。The class forwards trace messages that are written to the log to ASP.NET Web page output channels. 您可以藉由新增啟用追蹤轉寄至您的 Web.config 檔案，做為接聽程式中的物件[追蹤項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05f08d15-1e2c-4c56-84d1-b1d7ba039af6)子區段[ <system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md)一節。You can enable trace forwarding by adding a object to your Web.config file as a listener in the [trace Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05f08d15-1e2c-4c56-84d1-b1d7ba039af6) subsection of the [<system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md) section. 您也可以新增至接聽程式集合以程式設計的方式。You can also add a to the listeners collection programmatically. 通常，這是藉由新增至應用程式啟動期間的集合使用`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的方法。Commonly, this is done by adding a to the collection during application startup, using the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何路由傳送訊息至 Web 表單的輸出。The following code example demonstrates how to route messages to Web form output. 在程式碼範例示範典型 Web 表單，其中包含和控制項。The code example shows a typical Web form containing a and control. 在 Web form 上啟用追蹤，並呈現時，將會附加至 Web form 的追蹤輸出。Tracing is enabled on the Web form and trace output is appended to the Web form when it is rendered. 您可以檢查中的追蹤訊息**追蹤資訊**的追蹤輸出的資料表。You can examine the trace messages in the **Trace Information** table of the trace output. 如果您已啟用正確地如在組態檔中，您可以看到這兩個類別的追蹤訊息`"Trace Test"`。If you have enabled the correctly in your configuration file, you see both trace messages with the category `"Trace Test"`. 不過，如果您未啟用，您會看到只會寫入追蹤訊息物件。However, if you have not enabled the , you see only the trace message that is written to the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_2/CS/form2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_2/VB/form2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 使用指定的系統和事件資料，將事件訊息寫入網頁或 ASP.NET 追蹤檢視器。

span.span: Writes an event message to a Web page or to the ASP.NET trace viewer using the specified system and event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將事件訊息寫入物件使用`source`做為類別目錄和`message`做為訊息。The method writes the event message to the object using `source` as the category and `message` as the message.

summary.span: 使用指定的系統和事件資料，將當地語系化事件訊息寫入網頁或 ASP.NET 追蹤檢視器。

span.span: Writes a localized event message to a Web page or to the ASP.NET trace viewer using the specified system and event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法，傳遞`format`並`args`並使用來做為要寫入的追蹤檢視器或網頁的訊息格式化字串的屬性。The method calls the method, passing `format` and `args` and using the property to format the string as the message to write to the trace viewer or Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會寫入輸出，即使它已啟用組態檔中的物件。The method does not write to the object output, even if it is enabled in the configuration file.
